message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Mixed session with strength in capital goods, select financials, and metals. Notable momentum/breakout setups in CHOLAFIN, CUMMINSIND, THERMAX, and HINDCOPPER. Our portfolio closed positive; no urgent actions needed before Monday.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Buy on strength >345", "reason": "Strong trend day (+3.6%) closing near high with solid volume; potential continuation if clears 345 decisively.", "price": 343.10},
    {"symbol": "CHOLAFIN", "signal": "Momentum buy above 1755", "reason": "Range expansion and close near high with high volume; watch for breakout continuation >1755.", "price": 1733.60},
    {"symbol": "CUMMINSIND", "signal": "Breakout continuation >4205", "reason": "Bullish follow-through candle; closing strong near 52W region; buy on strength above 4205.", "price": 4183.20},
    {"symbol": "THERMAX", "signal": "Buy on dips 3230–3250", "reason": "Fresh breakout candle; look for shallow pullback entry with strength in industrials.", "price": 3276.50},
    {"symbol": "SBICARD", "signal": "Reversal long above 935", "reason": "Long lower wick reclaiming 920 zone; confirmation above 935 improves reward-to-risk.", "price": 928.95},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Add on close >424", "reason": "Consolidating at highs with heavy volume; adding above 424 reduces false-break risk.", "price": 422.05},
    {"symbol": "TATACOMM", "signal": "Continuation above 1910", "reason": "Strong rebound from 1843; clearing 1910 likely resumes uptrend.", "price": 1896.00},
    {"symbol": "LAURUSLABS", "signal": "Watch for reclaim >940", "reason": "Rejected at 943 but defended 902; strength only above 940 for adds.", "price": 926.40}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 8749.95,
    "total_value": 26234.65,
    "holdings_count": 4,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ 2385.00 (LTP 2475.00)",
      "LTF: 30 units @ 266.26 (LTP 267.00)",
      "BEL: 10 units @ 412.80 (LTP 422.05)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units @ 900.05 (LTP 926.40)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Volume leaders: NHPC, GAIL, BEL, GMRINFRA; power names mixed (NHPC red, NTPCGREEN steady).",
    "Metals: HINDCOPPER showed strong momentum; SAIL flat—prefer HINDCOPPER on strength.",
    "Capital goods/industrials strong: CUMMINSIND, THERMAX, KEI advancing; look for follow-through if indices remain firm.",
    "Financials mixed: CHOLAFIN strong; SBICARD reversal attempt; AUBANK weak—avoid until it reclaims 872.",
    "Exchanges: BSE consolidating near highs; CDSL soft; MCX sold to 9000 area—watch for support hold.",
    "Pharma/chemicals: LAURUSLABS defended 902 but below 940 trigger; ZYDUS/LUPIN stable; NAVINFLUOR faded from open.",
    "IT midcaps: KPITTECH green; PERSISTENT muted; COFORGE rangebound—no immediate edge.",
    "Consumer: DABUR steady; JUBLFOOD soft—avoid until it reclaims 600.",
    "Infra/Rail: RVNL/IRCON largely flat; IRCTC soft; GMRINFRA constructive above 93.",
    "Realty: PRESTIGE firm; OBEROIRLTY positive close.",
    "Risk management (current holdings): trail BSE >2425; BEL add only on close >424; LTF protect below 258; LAURUS risk line near 900."
  ]
}
